subject: Create a backyard oasis
body:
National Home Gardening Club

PLUS?Your FREE Gardening Shears  


Gardening How-To magazine, official publication of the National Home Gardening Club, is your personal guide to planning, planting and cultivating your way to a beautiful garden!  Through in-depth articles and step-by-step instructions, you'll have everything you need to create an oasis in your own backyard.
